required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Xenon-anesthesia on Patients Undergoing Major Liver-resection
clinical_study.official_title: Xenon-anesthesia on Patients Undergoing Major Liver-resection: Randomized Controlled Trial

brief_summary.textblock: The aim of this study is to compare the postoperative outcome of patients undergoing major liver resection under xenon- compared to desflurane-anesthesia.

detailed_description.textblock: The aim of this study is to compare the postoperative liver function and additional outcome parameters of patients undergoing major liver resection under xenon- compared to desflurane-anesthesia. Xenon is known to maintain hemodynamic stability and consecutive tissue perfusion. Together with its potential for ischemic pre-conditioning, we hypothesize a protective effect of xenon on post-operative liver failure and ischemia/reperfusion injury.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: Single-center, controlled, double-blinded, randomized, two-arm parallel, interventional clinical trial
study_design_info.masking_description: This trial will be performed double-blinded. After randomization neither the patients nor the investigator of the baseline assessment and the postoperative assessment will be aware of the treatment allocation. The intraoperative anesthesiologist will not be blinded, due to feasibility and safety reasons.

primary_outcome.measure: Time-course of postoperative liver injury and function
primary_outcome.description: The primary study outcome is the difference in postoperative liver injury and function between the two study arms, measured by the perioperative time-course of the liver transaminase alanine-aminotransferase (ALAT) preoperative and on postoperative days (POD) 1-3, 5 and 7.

secondary_outcome.measure: Intra- and postoperative blood loss
secondary_outcome.description: Difference of intra- and postoperative blood loss between the two study arms until discharge from ICU or POD 7 (whichever occurs first)

secondary_outcome.measure: Quantity of intra- and postoperative infusions
secondary_outcome.description: Difference in quantity of infused crystalloids abd colloids between the two study arms until discharge from ICU or POD 7 (whichever occurs first)

secondary_outcome.measure: Quantity of intra- and postoperative blood products
secondary_outcome.description: Difference in quantity of transfused packed red blood cells (RBCs), fresh frozen plasma (FFP) and platelet concentrates between the two study arms until discharge from ICU or POD 7 (whichever occurs first)

secondary_outcome.measure: Quantity of intra- and postoperative coagulation products
secondary_outcome.description: Difference in quantity of administered tranexamic acid, fibrinogen and prothrombin complex concentrates between the two study arms until discharge from ICU or POD 7 (whichever occurs first)

secondary_outcome.measure: Necessity and duration of surgical pringle maneuver
secondary_outcome.description: Difference in necessity and duration of intraoperative pringle maneuver performed by the surgeon between study groups

secondary_outcome.measure: Necessity and duration of surgical total vascular occlusion
secondary_outcome.description: Difference in necessity and duration of intraoperative total vascular occlusion performed by the surgeon between study groups

secondary_outcome.measure: Surgery time
secondary_outcome.description: Difference in surgery time between study groups

secondary_outcome.measure: Fibrosis in the resected liver tissue
secondary_outcome.description: Difference in fibrosis in the resected liver tissue between the two study arms

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of hepatocytes in synthesis phase in the resected liver tissue
secondary_outcome.description: Difference in number of hepatocytes in synthesis phase in the resected liver tissue between the two study arms

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of macrophages in the resected liver tissue
secondary_outcome.description: Difference in number of macrophages in the resected liver tissue between the two study arms

secondary_outcome.measure: Expression of Interleukin 6 (IL-6) in the resected liver tissue
secondary_outcome.description: Difference in expression of Interleukin 6 (IL-6) in the resected liver tissue between the two study arms

secondary_outcome.measure: Expression of tumor necrosis factor (TNF) in the resected liver tissue
secondary_outcome.description: Difference in expression of tumor necrosis factor (TNF) in the resected liver tissue between the two study arms

secondary_outcome.measure: Expression of hepatocyte growth factor (HGF) in the resected liver tissue
secondary_outcome.description: Difference in expression of hepatocyte growth factor (HGF) in the resected liver tissue between the two study arms

secondary_outcome.measure: Expression of epidermal growth factor (EGF) in the resected liver tissue
secondary_outcome.description: Difference in expression of epidermal growth factor (EGF) in the resected liver tissue between the two study arms

secondary_outcome.measure: Expression of fibroblast growth factor (FGF) in the resected liver tissue
secondary_outcome.description: Difference in expression of fibroblast growth factor (FGF) in the resected liver tissue between the two study arms

secondary_outcome.measure: Expression of insulin-like growth factors I/II (IGF-I/II) in the resected liver tissue
secondary_outcome.description: Difference in expression of insulin-like growth factors I/II (IGF-I/II) in the resected liver tissue between the two study arms

secondary_outcome.measure: Weight of the resected liver tissue
secondary_outcome.description: Difference in weight of the resected liver tissue normalized to body weight (%BW) between the two study arms

secondary_outcome.measure: Computer tomography-assisted planimetry of the resected liver tissue
secondary_outcome.description: Difference in area of the resected liver tissue, assessed with computer tomography assisted planimetry, between the two study arms

secondary_outcome.measure: Time-course of hemoglobin (Hb)
secondary_outcome.description: Difference in laboratory data, measured by the time-course of hemoglobin (Hb), between the two study arms postoperatively until discharge from ICU or POD 7 (whichever occurs first)

secondary_outcome.measure: Time-course of platelet count
secondary_outcome.description: Difference in laboratory data, measured by the time-course of platelet count, between the two study arms postoperatively until discharge from ICU or POD 7 (whichever occurs first)

secondary_outcome.measure: Time-course of prothrombin time (PT)
secondary_outcome.description: Difference in laboratory data, measured by the time-course of prothrombin time (PT), between the two study arms postoperatively until discharge from ICU or POD 7 (whichever occurs first)

secondary_outcome.measure: Time-course of partial thromboplastin time (PTT)
secondary_outcome.description: Difference in laboratory data, measured by the time-course of partial thromboplastin time (PTT), between the two study arms postoperatively until discharge from ICU or POD 7 (whichever occurs first)

secondary_outcome.measure: Time-course of bilirubin
secondary_outcome.description: Difference in laboratory data, measured by the time-course of bilirubin, between the two study arms postoperatively until discharge from ICU or POD 7 (whichever occurs first)

secondary_outcome.measure: Time-course of aspartate aminotransferase (ASAT)
secondary_outcome.description: Difference in laboratory data, measured by the time-course of aspartate aminotransferase (ASAT), between the two study arms postoperatively until discharge from ICU or POD 7 (whichever occurs first)

secondary_outcome.measure: Time-course of creatinine
secondary_outcome.description: Difference in laboratory data, measured by the time-course of creatinine, between the two study arms postoperatively until discharge from ICU or POD 7 (whichever occurs first)

secondary_outcome.measure: Time-course of lactate
secondary_outcome.description: Difference in laboratory data, measured by the time-course of lactate, between the two study arms postoperatively until discharge from ICU or POD 7 (whichever occurs first)

secondary_outcome.measure: Time-course of albumin
secondary_outcome.description: Difference in laboratory data, measured by the time-course of albumin, between the two study arms postoperatively until discharge from ICU or POD 7 (whichever occurs first)

secondary_outcome.measure: Time-course of international normalized ratio (INR)
secondary_outcome.description: Difference in laboratory data, measured by the time-course of international normalized ratio (INR) levels, between the two study arms postoperatively until discharge from ICU or POD 7 (whichever occurs first)

secondary_outcome.measure: Postoperative peak of blood lactate
secondary_outcome.description: Difference in postoperative peak of blood lactate between the two study groups until discharge from ICU or POD 7 (whichever occurs first)

secondary_outcome.measure: Length of ICU stay
secondary_outcome.description: Difference in ICU length of stay between the two study arms

secondary_outcome.measure: Length of hospital stay
secondary_outcome.description: Difference in hospital length of stay between the two study arms

secondary_outcome.measure: Postoperative mortality
secondary_outcome.description: Difference in mortality between the two study arms until postoperative day 30

secondary_outcome.measure: Adverse events
secondary_outcome.description: Difference in quality and quantity of adverse events between the two study arms

secondary_outcome.measure: Difference in mortality, assessed by 30 days follow up via phone
secondary_outcome.description: Difference in mortality between the two study arms

secondary_outcome.measure: Difference in coagulation disorder, assessed by 30 days follow up via phone
secondary_outcome.description: Difference in coagulation disorder between the two study arms

secondary_outcome.measure: Difference in re-admission to hospital, assessed by 30 days follow up via phone
secondary_outcome.description: Difference in re-admission to hospital between the two study arms

secondary_outcome.measure: Difference in other adverse events, assessed by 30 days follow up via phone
secondary_outcome.description: Difference in other adverse events between the two study arms

clinical_study.condition: Liver Function After Partial Liver Resection

arm_group.description: Xenon concentration of 50-60 % will be used for maintenance of general anesthesia and will be adjusted to maintain Bispectral index (BIS) value between 40 and 60.

Desflurane concentrations of 4-5%/0.8 minimum alveolar concentration (MAC) respectively will be used for maintenance of general anesthesia and will be adjusted to maintain BIS index value between 40 and 60.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- ≥ 3 segments liver resection
- ≥ 18 years
- Both gender
- American Society of Anesthesiologists (ASA) classification I-III
- Written informed consent prior to study participation
Exclusion Criteria:
Subjects, fulfilling one or more of the following exclusion criteria will not be included in the study:
- Severe pulmonary or airway disease
- Severe liver disease, accompanied by a Child-Pugh class >A
- Allergy/hypersensitivity to study medications
- ASA ≥ IV
- Patients susceptible to malignant hyperthermia
- Women who are pregnant, breast-feeding or women of childbearing potential not using adequate contraceptive methods
- Patients with preeclampsia or eclampsia
- Patients legally unable to give written informed consent.
- Patients with risk of high oxygen demand
- Patient with seriously impaired cardiac function
- All contraindications for xenon anesthesia according to the summary of product characteristics LENOXe
- Patient participates in a parallel interventional clinical trial during this study or receives an investigational drug within 30 days prior to inclusion into this study

facility.name: University Hospital RWTH Aachen University, Department of Anesthesiology
